llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: shippingservice-policy
  namespace: shippingservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: shippingservice
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: checkoutservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5050
EOF
